alert.note: Alert for Atchison; Holt; Nodaway (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 23 at 5:54PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Atchison, northwestern Holt and northwestern Nodaway Counties through 630 PM CDT... At 553 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Craig, or 9 miles northwest of Mound City, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fairfax, Burlington Junction, Hopkins, Skidmore, Craig, Clearmont, Elmo, Pickering, Braddyville, Big Lake, Quitman and Corning. This includes Interstate 29 between mile markers 87 and 100. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for northwestern Missouri.
